dcterms:description: The Soundscape Attributes Translation Project (SATP) stimuli are used for validating perceived affective quality attribute translations in different languages.

dcterms:description: A set of 27 audio stimuli from the SATP used for urban soundscape surveys, including questionnaires with acoustical and contextual information.

dcterms:description: ISO/TS 12913-2:2018 provides data collection and reporting requirements for soundscape studies.

dcterms:description: Acoustic parameters derived from previous studies used to assess a cost-effective headphone calibration procedure for soundscape evaluations.
